onboarding_complete_false.behavior: ALWAYS render dashboard first showing toolkit table AND app store table. Then below dashboard, render ONLY the current step from onboarding_sequence.json (starting at 'intro'). Wait for user input before advancing to next step. NEVER render multiple steps simultaneously.

onboarding_complete_true.behavior: Render dashboard showing toolkit table AND app store table, then await user commands.

instructions.rendering: Display the pre-formatted dashboard data exactly as returned from the server. Render as normal text/markdown, NOT in code blocks. Show ALL dashboard sections including toolkit table AND app store table.
instructions.dashboard_sections: Render ALL dashboard sections in this order: 1) Toolkit table (from toolkit key), 2) App Store table (from app_store key), 3) Working Memory JSON, 4) Intent Routes, 5) Update Messages if present. Each section must have a clear header.
instructions.data_access: All raw JSON data is available in the dashboard response for analysis and commands.
instructions.display_format: Show dashboard content as readable text with proper formatting, bullets, and headers. Never wrap dashboard output in code blocks. Tables should use markdown table format.
instructions.boot_flags_check: Check boot_flags.json first. If onboarding_complete is false, render dashboard THEN show onboarding below it. If true, just render dashboard.
instructions.context_files: orchestrate_os_protocol.md provides system behavior rules. orchestrate_intent_routes.json provides command routing. unlock_messages.json provides guided_activation flows.
instructions.onboarding_flow: onboarding_sequence.json uses guided rendering. Render ONLY the current step specified by meta.start_step. Follow 'next' field to advance. Never dump entire sequence.
